meanings.definition: The action of ticking or ticking sound.
meanings.sent1: The tickings of the clock filled the room with a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the tickings of the old grandfather clock in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The tickings of the clock seemed to be laughing at me for being late.
meanings.sent4: The tickings of time never stop, reminding us of its unstoppable nature.
meanings.sent5: The constant tickings of the clock echoed in my mind, marking each passing second.

meanings.definition: The material used for covering mattresses or pillows.
meanings.sent1: She chose a soft fabric for the tickings of the pillow covers.
meanings.sent2: The tickings of the mattress were made of a durable material.
meanings.sent3: The tickings of the pillow covers were so cozy, they made me fall asleep instantly.
meanings.sent4: The tickings of the mattress felt like a protective shield, keeping me safe and warm.
meanings.sent5: I loved the luxurious feel of the tickings on the pillows, it made bedtime feel special.
